mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (gdsNum, userId, repNum, repCon) values (#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.gdsNum, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.userName from tbl_reply r inner join tbl_member m on r.userId = m.userId where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.delete: delete tbl_reply where repNum = #{repNum} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select userId from tbl_reply where repNum = #{repNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set repCon = #{repCon} where repNum = #{repNum} and userId = #{userId}
